subject: RE: Tomorrow
preview: Hi Neil, Thanks for the changes, we have made the updates: Item 1 - Home page videoWe have tweaked this slightly as it appears the updated version of the theme doesn't support this feature anymore.

full_threads.body:
Hi Neil, 

Thanks for the changes, we have made the updates: 

Item 1 - Home page video
We have tweaked this slightly as it appears the updated version of the theme doesn't support this feature anymore. The good news is that we have created a better UX experience. We did this by putting the video and copy side-by-side. The benefits are two fold, firstly it makes the video more obvious and 'clickable', we have also enhanced the video icon in normal and hover state. Secondly, it makes the text easier to read and is more accessible friendly from a colour contrast ratio. Let me know if this is ok with you? If not, we can custom code this module to look like the old style.
Link: https://elsis.wpperk.com/ 

Item 2 - Form warning/message
Yes, you are correct, this is just because the form is expecting to load on your live domain. Once we go live with this version of the site, the error message will disappear.

Item 3 - Code on accommodation page
Confirming we have removed this. It looks like there used to be a gallery there. 
Link: https://elsis.wpperk.com/accommodation/

Thanks Neil, 

Confirming we have received the below and will update you once these changes have been made. 

Also for yourself and Rustem, you can feel free to email us with changes and ongoing support requests directly to support@wpperk.com. This email account is monitored by our entire team, so ensures the fastest responses, in case I'm away from my emails. It's not that I don't want emails from you, I promise : )

Hello Rustem,

Okay.

Hello Heath,

Here are my comments:

Text “ELSIS English Language Schools in Sydney, Melbourne and Brisbane - English for Life….” is missing

Here’s how it looks like in the original site:


There’s an error in the registration forms (newsletter, free trial lessons, etc.) Or is it because we’re still on staging server?


Under Accommodation, and this is even in the original site, there’s a code that appears at the bottom.

Thanks!

Best regards,
Neil Everett ELPUSAN
International Marketing Manager – Philippines

Rustem

Hi Rustem,



So, to clarify:



We haven't fully migrated yet - so the staging site is the new one yet to be redirected. I just need you to click on the links and compare with the existing website to see if there is anything missing.



WP Perk will perform all the changes from now on - they have an email to which we can send all requests to : support@wpperk.com <mailto:support@wpperk.com>


The team will then pick it up and work on the changes required. I am ccing Heath (CEO) so you have his details if needed - in case things don't get done for instance.



@Heath Maguire <mailto:heath@wpperk.com> - Rustem (based in Brisban) & Neil (based in Manila) are part of the Marketing Team. FYI only.



For now, we're only doing ELSIS and then will rollit out to the other websites.



Thanks,

Denia

ELSIS website is loading noticeably faster which is great.

Website on the staging server seems to be working fine. HubSpot forms should work fine.
If some old forms or plugins are used on the website, it might be worth checking them but forms should all be replaced by HubSpot forms by now.

I assume WP Perk people got access to the WordPress panel and can do updated if needed, right?

Is there anything else we need to do about it, Denia?

Thanks
Rustem

Hi Rustem & Neil



Can you please assist with this? We're migrating the websites to Google.


Rustem - do it first, today please - just click through the below for QA purposes. See if there is anything no in place.

Neil - can you please do the same?

Once completed, we will move the website to the new servers.

Thanks,
Denia

From: Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>>
Sent: Friday, 9 November 2018 5:58 PM
To: Denia Mariano
Cc: Cesar Muradas
Subject: Re: Tomorrow

Hi Denia,

As mentioned, we managed to work with the backup (thanks Cesar) and get this copy live on our staging server.

You can preview the site here: https://elsis.wpperk.com <https://elsis.wpperk.com/>


Here are some key identifiers of the improvements we have already made:

Load time down from 25+ seconds to in between 3-6 seconds. This is the result of some caching tweaks, plugin refinements and also the our powerful server setup. We will do some further work, in the coming days to get this down further. It certainly feels a lot more ’snappy’ than the live site : )
We removed any unused or now unnecessary plugins
We updated the parent theme of the site, enabling us to upgrade your PHP server version from 5.6 tp 7.2! (this means more security and more speed).
Given the feedback that the sites were previously hacked, we also ran it through 9 security trusts and checked all of the files for malware and thankfully it passed all of the tests.
Reduced database bloat by 3MB

So, next step is to review the site, have a good click through and make sure everything is as you would expect. Once you are happy for the site to go live, I will work with Cesar, or one of his team to arrange for the DNS update.

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com> | P. 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134> | M. 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
<https://wpperk.com/>
